whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.description: We are a team of designers, motion artists, and visual storytellers driven by creativity and clarity.
whoWeAre.text: At PICTORIAL, we work closely with brands to understand their vision, audience, and goals — and translate them into visuals that feel bold, consistent, and memorable.
whoWeAre.closing: Every project we take on is built with intention, precision, and purpose.

whyPictorial.title: Why PICTORIAL

cta.title: Let's Create Something Pictorial
cta.description: If you're looking to build a brand that stands out visually and connects emotionally, PICTORIAL is ready to bring your vision to life.
cta.closing: Let's create visuals that leave an impression.

servicesDetailed.title: Brand Identity
servicesDetailed.description: Your brand is more than visuals — it's how people recognize, remember, and trust you.
servicesDetailed.subtitle: We create complete brand identities that feel intentional, consistent, and visually powerful, helping your brand communicate clearly across every touchpoint.

servicesDetailed.title: Scroll-Stopping Motion Graphics
servicesDetailed.description: In a world full of content, attention is everything.
servicesDetailed.subtitle: Our motion graphics are designed to instantly pause the scroll, communicate your message within seconds, and elevate your brand's visual presence across digital platforms.

servicesDetailed.title: Video Editing
servicesDetailed.description: Great videos don't just play — they connect.
servicesDetailed.subtitle: We turn raw footage into cinematic, story-driven edits that engage viewers, enhance brand storytelling, and create lasting visual impact.

servicesDetailed.title: Social-First Visual Storytelling
servicesDetailed.description: Social media is about connection, not just presence.
servicesDetailed.subtitle: We design social-first visuals that feel native to platforms, reflect your brand personality, and encourage engagement while keeping your feed visually consistent.

servicesDetailed.title: Logo Design
servicesDetailed.description: A logo is the most recognizable element of your brand.
servicesDetailed.subtitle: We design distinctive, meaningful logos that are built to last, work across all platforms, and represent your brand with clarity and confidence.

servicesDetailed.title: Packaging Design
servicesDetailed.description: Packaging is your brand's first physical interaction with customers.
servicesDetailed.subtitle: We create packaging designs that attract attention, communicate quality, and elevate the overall product experience from shelf to unboxing.

contact.title: Let's Build Something Visual & Impactful
contact.subtitle: Have a brand that needs to stand out?
contact.description: Whether it's a scroll-stopping motion graphic, an unforgettable logo, or a full brand identity — we're here to turn your ideas into visuals that connect and convert.
